confirmation.header: # The hearing bundle is being generated
confirmation.body:
#### What happens next

You will soon be able to view the hearing bundle in the [Documents tab](/cases/case-details/1234#Documents) in your case details page.</br>All other parties will be notified when the hearing bundle is available.</br>If the bundle fails to generate, you will get a notification and you will need to try again.
